# Military Academy (Building)
## Overview
**Military Academy**

**Create** 142 Goods, 16 Influence, 129 Labor, 2 Magic (6,100 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Armory (Room)|Armory]], 1 [[Bath (Room)|Bath]], 1 [[Bedroom (Room)|Bedroom]], 1 [[Bell Tower (Room)|Bell Tower]], 1 [[Book Repository (Room)|Book Repository]], 1 [[Cell (Room)|Cell]], 2 [[Classroom (Room)|Classrooms]], 1 [[Common Room (Room)|Common Room]], 1 [[Courtyard (Room)|Courtyard]], 1 [[Dojo (Room)|Dojo]], 1 [[Greenhouse (Room)|Greenhouse]], 1 [[Infirmary (Room)|Infirmary]], 1 [[Kitchen (Room)|Kitchen]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Lodging (Room)|Lodging]], 2 [[Office (Room)|Offices]], 1 [[Scriptorium (Room)|Scriptorium]], 1 [[Sitting Room (Room)|Sitting Room]], 1 [[Statue (Room)|Statue]], 1 [[Storage (Room)|Storage]], 1 [[War Room (Room)|War Room]]

An institution dedicated to the study of war and the training of elite soldiers and officers.
